channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan 5min.
channel.desc: Tokushima ramen means tonkotsu! Topped with pork belly, and, of all things, raw egg-enjoy a one-of-a-kind bowl of ramen.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Miyamae Yoshiyuki (Fashion designer) visits Kochi. Kochi's Sunday market features around 500 stalls with fixed locations. Miyamae contemplates how communication has contributed to its longevity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Picture Brides: Echoes From Beyond The Frontier
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Manben: Behind The Scenes Of Manga With Urasawa Naoki
channel.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: The title role in the TV series "Shogun," based on James Clavell's eponymous novel, was modeled on Tokugawa Ieyasu. We reveal his secret strategy for building Edo, Nagoya, Osaka and Nijo-jo Castles.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Crafts, fashion, products, buildings, and food: explore a diverse range of Japanese designs and the ideas and values of their creators. Our presenters visit designers at work to reveal new stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Ah Neo
channel.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Sandwiches.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan
channel.desc: On Awajishima and Ieshima in the Seto Inland Sea, islanders utilize the strong winter winds and waves to enhance local specialties like sweet onions, handmade noodles, incense sticks and seaweed.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Spiritual Explorers
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Be earthquake-ready! Learn survival tips for quakes and when you're trapped under rubble. You'll want to watch this before your next trip to Japan.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Fit With The Doctor's Cyborg
channel.desc: Come check out "Pro Tips" and "Improvement Points" on basic mat exercises: the forward roll and the backward roll.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-1.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: On this unique trip around Japan, discover the lesser-known charms and customs of regions through the eyes of cats! Filmed by wildlife photographe,Iwago Mitsuaki.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: A 150-km cycle ride through the Oki Islands off Japan's west coast. These beautiful islands are famed for their crystal clear seas, deep mysterious forests, and rich historical traditions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Listen To The Earth
channel.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Colmar, located in the Alsace region of northeastern France, developed significantly during the 13th century. The creative woodwork on the buildings is attributed to the city's wealthy merchants.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Architectural designer and jewelry maker Kigami Natsuko uses things like discarded tile to create earrings and other jewelry. Their simple beauty expresses her belief that any scrap can truly shine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: On The Edge
channel.desc: As the number of refugees in the world reaches unprecedented heights, smugglers have appeared claiming to transport them to safety, but instead they become pawns in a game with their lives at stake.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Perfect 2 Hour Guide
channel.desc: Todaiji Temple is a famed World Heritage Site with a host of National Treasures like the Great Buddha. In our ultimate two-hour tour, we unveil the best ways to experience everything it has to offer.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Live
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN will broadcast GRAND SUMO September Tournament Day 1 action live from Tokyo, as top wrestlers have their first bouts of the 15-day contest.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: A 150-km cycle ride through the Oki Islands off Japan's west coast. These beautiful islands are famed for their crystal clear seas, deep mysterious forests, and rich historical traditions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Listen To The Earth
channel.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: seven-piece idol group SWEET STEADY (a sister group to FRUITS ZIPPER); and singer-songwriter Ito Kashitaro, whose online videos led to a major-label debut.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: For hundreds of years, Japanese people have used name stamps, known as hanko, to sign their name. In a 5-minute digest, we discover their history and explore what a hanko-free future might look like.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Okinawa: The Holiest Place
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ekiben Japan
channel.desc: Noto's nature was scarred in the 2024 earthquake, yet the abalone bento still celebrates the peninsula's premium shellfish,enhanced with local salt.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: dealing with a complaint from a neighbor. Luu Van Chien, from Vietnam, works as a carpenter. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with a complaint from a neighbor living near a construction site.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The New Adventures Of Rockie And Her Friends
channel.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Shimomura Yoko created music for many of the world's most popular video games, and was recently awarded a BAFTA Fellowship. She explains how she writes music that captivates players.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #7 Domo, a versatile word/ Domo means "very", "hello" or "thanks", depending on the situation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: Throughout 2025, NHK WORLD-JAPAN is marking 80 years since WW2's end with content from Japan's unique, peace-seeking perspective. We introduce three programs available to stream on demand.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony #2 Summer
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: Cape Ashizuri is marked by rugged cliffs and peculiar rocks. A strong current off its coast has been the cause of many accidents. Enjoy the scenery at the cape, a place of worship, in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 30 Japanese suffer from mental illness. We follow a woman who finds it hard to do simple tasks due to her illness, as she goes to rehabilitation for returning to work.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Shibuya is one of Tokyo's largest cities. A piano is placed near a ticket gate at the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Journey to the great northern land of Japan: Hokkaido. Its scenery changes dramatically throughout the year. Witness the beauty of Hokkaido through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #7 Domo, a versatile word/ Domo means "very", "hello" or "thanks", depending on the situation.

channel.title: Herbal Symphony #2 Summer
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.desc: Cape Ashizuri is marked by rugged cliffs and peculiar rocks. A strong current off its coast has been the cause of many accidents. Enjoy the scenery at the cape, a place of worship, in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Kumamoto is recovering from the 2016 earthquake. A piano is placed in a shopping arcade for a limited period, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Experience the fascinating sights of the airports and transport hubs which connect Japan with the world. Time-lapse photography will show you how these places bustle with activity around the clock.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet French illustrator Emilie Bouquet who runs an eco-friendly farm in Okuma, Fukushima, and Brazilian Suellen Taniguchi who supports kids and teens with learning difficulties in Isesaki, Gunma.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: A centuries-old eel catching technique. Bridges designed to be submerged in the river. Locals have found ingenious ways to coexist with the Shimanto. See this mighty river in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 27 people don't own a smartphone. We follow a man who chose not to own one, and his reason not to. What has he gained in life by giving up his smartphone, a modern-day necessity and obsession.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life(5)
channel.desc: Mornings begin early for fishmongers and vegetable peddlers at Nihonbashi Bridge, and here is a reason. They are not going to bow to the lord's procession. The bustling scene from everyday Edo life.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony #2 Summer
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: Throughout 2025, NHK WORLD-JAPAN is marking 80 years since WW2's end with content from Japan's unique, peace-seeking perspective. We introduce three programs available to stream on demand.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Hirosaki City in Aomori Prefecture is known for its Western architecture. A piano is placed inside the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hydrogen gas inhalation is proving to be a potential game-changer in emergency medicine. It improves survival rates and reduces severe aftereffects that can occur after the heart restarts.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
channel.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: A centuries-old eel catching technique. Bridges designed to be submerged in the river. Locals have found ingenious ways to coexist with the Shimanto. See this mighty river in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #7 Domo, a versatile word/ Domo means "very", "hello" or "thanks", depending on the situation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The world's thinnest washi (traditional paper) is just 0.03 mm thick but tough, and is used to restore cultural artifacts. See Tosa's natural landscape and washi artisans at work, in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Shimanto is a nature-rich town in Kochi Prefecture. A piano is placed on a park's outdoor stage, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The delicious bonito Tosa is known for spoils easily, and the flavor varies greatly. Fishmongers at a local port know exactly how to spot the best ones. Watch them in action, in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #7 Domo, a versatile word/ Domo means "very", "hello" or "thanks", depending on the situation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: Throughout 2025, NHK WORLD-JAPAN is marking 80 years since WW2's end with content from Japan's unique, peace-seeking perspective. We introduce three programs available to stream on demand.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The world's thinnest washi (traditional paper) is just 0.03 mm thick but tough, and is used to restore cultural artifacts. See Tosa's natural landscape and washi artisans at work, in time-lapse.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Traditional techniques and resourceful recipes! Chefs Saito and Rika, present their unique approaches to cooking delicious Japanese food.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: An electronics retail store in Yokohama, Japan, has six floors filled with home appliances. For three days in spring, we asked customers what they came to buy in this season of new beginnings.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hydrogen gas inhalation is proving to be a potential game-changer in emergency medicine. It improves survival rates and reduces severe aftereffects that can occur after the heart restarts.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 15, Day 2 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Sumopedia

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hydrogen gas inhalation is proving to be a potential game-changer in emergency medicine. It improves survival rates and reduces severe aftereffects that can occur after the heart restarts.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Canadian Peter Skov follows the path trod by countless pilgrims along the Ontake Kodo through old villages and stunning scenery to the peak of sacred Mt. Ontake, soaring over 3,000 meters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: In 2020, Kitajima Masaaki published the world's first paper on how the spread of COVID-19 could be tracked by monitoring wastewater. He talks about making an impact on infectious disease control.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: Two local takes on ramen that kept Hiroshima fed during postwar reconstruction; flavors passed down for generations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: curved escalators.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Taira Yuiko promotes composting of food waste to create a sustainable cycle. She works with an NGO in Mongolia to form a local nutrient cycle, enriching the soil and teaching composting techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: At Kyoto University's CiRA, Kenji OSAFUNE is using iPS cells to find drug for hereditary kidney disease and has also created cells for kidney transplants. Take an in depth look at his challenges.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 16, Day 3 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 36 people in Japan are foreign residents. As its population declines, we look at Japanese society in a new era of foreign workers, through an IT startup where 90% of staff are foreigners.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Mt. Fuji's Faces
channel.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Hayashiya Tsuruko is breaking new ground by reinterpreting the Japanese art of classic rakugo comic storytelling from a woman's perspective. She talks about her message for modern audiences.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Eggplants-nasu-take the spotlight. Enjoy juicy mizu-nasu and melt-in-your-mouth Kamo-nasu. From traditional shojin ryori to sweets, discover the surprising range of Japanese eggplants.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Fussa, a suburban area in western Tokyo known for the presence of a U.S. military base. Join us as we discover its rural roots and trace its evolution into a vibrant multicultural town.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Hayashiya Tsuruko is breaking new ground by reinterpreting the Japanese art of classic rakugo comic storytelling from a woman's perspective. She talks about her message for modern audiences.
